tool_description: An API showing the Weather Forecast around the World
name: Weather Forecast Live
title: Weather Forecast Live

api_list.name: Get specific weather forecast source
api_list.description: This endpoint gets a specific weather forecast source.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://weather-forecast-live.p.rapidapi.com/weather/wetteronline"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "weather-forecast-live.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://weather-forecast-live.p.rapidapi.com/weather/{weatherid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "weather-forecast-live.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get actual World Weather Forecast
api_list.description: This endpoints returns the actual weather and forecast of weather from all over the world.
api_list.code:
